name: Appleblossom Academy 2
description:
Welcome to Appleblossom Academy....2!  It has been a few years in the future from the last game and you're a new protagonist with whole new friends! This time, you get to learn more about the girls from the last game through their younger siblings.

The routes themselves are fairly simplistic and short, but there are multiple endings to get. Try getting them all!

✧༺♥༻∞ *＊✿❀　❀✿＊* *＊✿❀　❀✿＊* *＊✿❀　❀✿＊*∞༺♥༻✧

***This game was made just for fun and to try out a program specifically for visual novels. It's not to be taken too seriously, as it was originally intended to be a parody game. If there are any issues with the game, please let me know!

****Don't bother with wolfboy. He gets nothing.

Thank you for playing ★~(◡﹏◕✿)
